search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Pushpress (pushpress.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for PushPress can be found here: [https://www.pushpress.com/pricing](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Pricing | PushPress Free Gym Management Software

extracted_content.content:
Pricing | PushPress Free Gym Management Software
===============
         

The PushPress Podcast features stories & strategies to help your gym thrive

[Subscribe Now ![Image 61: right arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/64f94135863e99653623340e_Icon%20right.svg)](https://www.pushpress.com/podcast)

[![Image 62](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/63ea72e8baba77efec4ff713_pp-logo-primary.svg)](https://www.pushpress.com/)

![Image 63](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/63eaa47f1754e40385fa431f_pp-primary.png)

Products

#### PushPress Platform

[![Image 64](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/63eaa47c78b2a0860f013565_pp-logo-core.svg) Gym management software that scales as you grow your gym or studio Explore Features](https://www.pushpress.com/features)

#### Add-on Products

[![Image 65](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/63eaa47c3821af52cc7e4a0d_pp-logo-grow.svg) A system to automate your lead engagement and convert more leads into paying clients](https://www.pushpress.com/products/grow-1)[![Image 66](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/63eaa47fb1e1922040eb83d0_pp-logo-branded%20app.png) A fully built out app for your clients to use with your branding on it](https://www.pushpress.com/products/branded-member-app)[![Image 67](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/63eaa47e5f3cc65290f41b8b_pp-logo-train.png) The only workout tracking system your gym needs](https://www.pushpress.com/products/train)[![Image 68](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/663acfb837fad73e8ee3a7b0_pp-logo-insurance.png) Cost-effective, flexible insurance options, adapted to protect your unique gym.](https://insurance.pushpress.com/?utm_source=pushpress&utm_medium=ppwebsite&utm_campaign=ga-rollout)

#### Integrations

[![Image 69](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/6082ad2ad01a284e815ab0c4_Rectangle%205.png)MailChimp ![Image 70](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/6082ad2690140a075de3efd6_Rectangle%206.png)Slack ![Image 71](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/6082ad26d01a284abb5ab0c3_Rectangle%207.png)Stripe ![Image 72](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/6082ad254844849252c86afb_Rectangle%208.png)Facebook Ads ![Image 73: Google Analytics](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/6082ad0ba40b3b5e470f7403_GA.png)Google Analytics ![Image 74](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/6082ad265ebc5072dfc94c93_Rectangle%2010.png)Zapier ![Image 75: PushPress is award winning gym management software](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/6082ad0c0760018e5ab63347_Group%201009.png)Nutrition And More](https://www.pushpress.com/integrations)

Products

#### PushPress Platform

[#### Core Gym management software built exclusively for your gym or studio.](https://www.pushpress.com/features)

#### Add-ons Products

[#### Grow Automate your lead engagement and convert more leads into paying clients](https://www.pushpress.com/products/grow-1)[#### Branded App A fully built out app for your clients to use with your branding on it](https://www.pushpress.com/products/branded-member-app)[#### Train The only workout tracking system your gym needs](https://www.pushpress.com/products/train)[#### Insurance Cost-effective, flexible insurance options, adapted to protect your unique gym.](https://insurance.pushpress.com/?utm_source=pushpress&utm_medium=ppwebsite&utm_campaign=ga-rollout)

#### Integrations

[![Image 76](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/6082af524844842835c8817f_Group%201011.png) +22](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

[Pricing](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing)[Customers](https://www.pushpress.com/customers)[About](https://www.pushpress.com/about)

Learn

![Image 77](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/6082952bfcd8e00340691547_NL.svg)

### Newsletter

The best newsletter for quick hits on current events, business, and the fitness industry!

[Subscribe](https://www.pushpress.com/goodstuff)

#### Industry Info

[![Image 78: PushPress is award winning gym management software](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/607ec988dcc34187c78a4c9d_Vector-1.svg) ##### Business of Fitness Blog Learn about trends, best practices, case studies, tips and more!](https://www.pushpress.com/blog)[![Image 79: PushPress is award winning gym management software](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/607ec9891dfbd529e41487de_Vector.svg) ##### Starting a Gym The ultimate resource for opening a Gym](https://www.pushpress.com/starting-a-gym)

#### Product info

[![Image 80](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/607ec98a7f3b8ecf28284ba1_Group.svg) ##### Release Notes We constantly improve our software, see what we have just worked on.](https://updates.pushpress.com/)[![Image 81](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/607ec989dcc34141118a4c9e_Group-1.svg) ##### Knowledge Base Help docs for the PushPress Ecosystem of Products.](https://help.pushpress.com/)

Learn

#### Industry Info

[#### Business of Fitness Blog Learn about trends, best practices, case studies, tips and more!](https://www.pushpress.com/blog)[#### Starting a Gym The ultimate resource for opening a Gym](https://www.pushpress.com/starting-a-gym)[#### Newsletter The best newsletter for quick hits on current events, business, and the fitness industry!](https://www.pushpress.com/goodstuff)

#### Product Info

[#### Release Notes We constantly improve our software, see what we have just worked on.](https://updates.pushpress.com/)[#### Knowledge Base Help docs for the PushPress Ecosystem of Products.](https://help.pushpress.com/)

[Sign in](https://app.pushpress.com/login)

[Get Started](https://signup.pushpress.com/signup)

All-in-One Gym Management Software
----------------------------------

Scale your business with flexible plans that meet your needs.
=============================================================

Free

$0 
---

Small gyms and studios ready to lay the foundation for growth and success

**Processing Rate\*  
**4.19% + .30 CC   
2.09% + .30ACH

**Support SLA  
**Self-serve resources and AI support\*\* with a 48-hour response time for human assistance.

[Talk to Sales to Get Started](https://signup.pushpress.com/signup)

[No monthly fees](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Pro

$159/mo
-------

Mid-size gyms and studios ready to scale their business and optimize operations

**Processing Rate\*  
**2.89% + .30 CC   
0.79% + .30ACH

**Support SLA  
**AI support\*\*, live human responses, and the option to schedule video support help calls.

[Talk to Sales to Get Started](https://signup.pushpress.com/signup)

Max

$229/mo
-------

Established gyms and studios ready to streamline operations and accelerate growth

**Processing Rate\*  
**2.75% + .30 CC   
0.79% + .30ACH

**Support SLA  
**AI support\*\*, live human responses, and the option to schedule video support help calls.

[Talk to Sales to Get Started](https://signup.pushpress.com/signup)

\*Price in USD  
\*\*AI support resolves 60% of conversations with 95% Customer Satisfaction score.

Compare all our features and choose a plan that works for you.
--------------------------------------------------------------

Feature

USERS

Leads

[![Image 82](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Prospects that are not members](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Admins

[![Image 83](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Accounts to manage settings, configurations and access to financial reports](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Members

[![Image 84](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Regular gym members, typically on recurring plans](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Staff

[![Image 85](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Staff will include all your trainers, coaches, instructors and support personal.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

AI Support

[![Image 86](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) AI support resolves 60% of conversations with 95% Customer Satisfaction score.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

INTERNAL INTEGRATIONS

Screens App

[![Image 87](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) In real-time see who has reserved and checked in to class with this app designed for a TV on the gym/studio floor.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Members App

[![Image 88](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Members use this to register for classes, update their personal information, make purchases and much more.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Staff App

[![Image 89](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) A comprehensive app that centralizes member profiles, check-ins, scheduling, sales, and real-time communication for seamless operations and exceptional member service.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Staff App - Kiosk Mode

[![Image 90](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) A self-service solution that streamlines member check-ins, real-time attendance tracking, and on-demand purchases while providing intuitive access to additional gym services for a frictionless experience.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Flex Fees

[![Image 91](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Flex Fees empower gym owners to set and control transaction fees, ensuring all proceeds go directly to the gym and not to third parties.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Commited Club

[![Image 92](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) PushPress's Committed Club feature streamlines tracking and rewarding consistent member attendance, driving enhanced engagement, retention, and growth.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Waitlisting

[![Image 93](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Auto-magic self-managing waitlist for when your classes hit maximum capacity.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Migration

[![Image 94](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Migrate your member data into PushPress from any other system with our simple 3-step tool. This will have you up and running in less than a day](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Appointments

[![Image 95](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Manage and schedule a appointments for Personal Training sessions.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Products

[![Image 96](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Sell products to members and drop-ins through our Dashboard or Store App](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Basic Workout Programming

[![Image 97](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Core includes Train Lite, giving you access to Basic Workout Programming to create and manage daily workouts. Upgrade to Train Pro for advanced features like score logging, benchmarks, habit tracking, and more.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Events

[![Image 98](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Holding an event like a BBQ or Competition? This will manage registrations and waivers for free or paid events.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Pre-order

[![Image 99](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Run product pre-orders so you are not holding inventory and out of pocket for initial stock purchase.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Documents

[![Image 100](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Get your Waiver or any other member agreement digitally signed and safely stored.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Payroll Report

[![Image 101](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) This payroll report aggregates all relevant data to give you a daily comprehensive, up-to-date view of your payroll information.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

EXTERNAL INTEGRATIONS

Slack

[![Image 102](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) A better messaging system for your team than email and text.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Mailchimp

[![Image 103](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Auto-sync of your member data to Mailchimp so you can run advanced targeted email campaigns.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Zapier

[![Image 104](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Easy automation for busy people. Zapier moves info between your web apps automatically, so you can focus on your most important work. This integration alone should save you days of manual boring work per month.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Google Analytics

[![Image 105](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Measure your Analytics ROI with tracking integrated into the PushPress purchase landing pages.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Google Calendar

[![Image 106](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Sync your staff coaching schedules with their Google Calendar](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Facebook Marketing

[![Image 107](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Embed your Facebook pixel on the PushPress purchase landing pages to accurately track your advertising ROI and conversions.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Free

Screens App

Members App

[![Image 168](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) Members use this to register for classes, update their personal information, make purchases and much more.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Staff App

[![Image 169](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60359921321f8d5992691da6/60359921321f8d4701691e2a_%F0%9F%94%B9%20Icon%20Color.svg) A comprehensive app that centralizes member profiles, check-ins, scheduling, sales, and real-time communication for seamless operations and exceptional member service.](https://www.pushpress.com/pricing#)

Flex Fees

Commited Club

Waitlisting
